questions.question:
A company stores its training datasets on Amazon S3 in the form of tabular data running into millions of rows.
The company needs to prepare this data for Machine Learning jobs.
The data preparation involves data selection, cleansing, exploration, and visualization using a single visual interface.

Which Amazon SageMaker service is the best fit for this requirement?
questions.Practice test: Practice Test #1 - Full Exam - AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate (MLA-C01)
